nodes.body: These mainly include the Yerdzongma (yer rdzong ma) excavations. Norbu says that the central treasure (dbus gter) scheme is more like the Nyingma (rnying ma) and does not include the ancient pre-Buddhist ritual traditions.
nodes.title: An Overview of the Bönpo Central Treasures

meta.title: An Overview of the Bönpo Central Treasures
